definitions.text: characterized by effort to the point of exhaustion; especially physical effort
examples: worked their arduous way up the mining valley
spent many laborious hours on the project

definitions.text: taxing to the utmost; testing powers of endurance; ; ; - F.D.Roosevelt
examples: his final, straining burst of speed
your willingness after these six arduous days to remain here

definitions.text: difficult to accomplish; demanding considerable mental effort and skill
examples: the arduous work of preparing a dictionary
